Class AffinityScheduler<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.scheduling.AffinityScheduler<T>
public class AffinityScheduler<T> extends Object
Affinity Scheduler for resource-aware task placement. Features: - GPU/CPU affinity - Memory requirements - Data locality - Worker labels/constraints
